commitResults.messageBody:
Welcome message contains default values (Duke)

Change the default value to "Echo", our selected name for the chatbot

Let's
* Change the filename to "Echo"
* Change the welcome banner to contain "Echo"
* Change filename to "Echo"
Added echo functionality to the chatbot

Current functionality only contains echo.

Let's
* allow user to store their input
* return the list that the user stores

When a user type in an input, it will be added as a task object.
The task entered also contains many different data (e.g. description,
status etc.).

Let's create a new class called "Task" containing all the different
data and functionality.

With the introduction of the Task class, we will update the code in the
main class to incorporate the Task class.

Let's
* change all the task element into the task object

Printing out Task object is manually typed out in the main file instead
of being done by the Task Object

Let's
* update Task.java to include the printing of String

The printing is manually typed instead of utilizing Task object

Let's
* update the main method to print from Task object itself

Deadline, Event, Todo are tasks, but with additional specific
functionality.

Let's
* Create these additional class file to ensure that the code are more
neat.

Current app does not allow the different type of tasks (todo, event,
deadline).

Let's
* Add the functionality of events, todo and deadline into our chatbot

Text entered by users are unpredictable. If there is incorrect input,
it might lead to an error output

Let's
* Handle error related to wrong input
* Handle error related to empty description

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Echo.java to incorporate arraylist instead of array
commitResults.messageBody:
Arraylist offers dynamic sizing and the ability to easily find, add,
and delete items.

Let's
* Change the type Array to Arraylist

To allow the users to delete tasks after they have completed it.

Let's
* add delete functionality into the chatbot

When we change a functionality, or add functionality, we will have to
retest all the cases

Let's
* Created an automated testing

commitResults.messageTitle: Clean code for clarity and maintainability
commitResults.messageBody:
The code contains long methods and redundant statements.

This will result in difficulty in maintaining it.

Let's
* Create a new method for welcome message
* shorten our method for updating list
* change to switch statement

The chatbot is unable to write it's Task list onto the file.

This results in the list disappearing whenever the bot reboots.

Let's update the chatbot to allow the user to save into a file.

commitResults.messageTitle: Bugs Fix: amend the splitting of user input
commitResults.messageBody:
Additional space added to the different information when splitting
user's input

This could cause additional bugs in the future

Let's amend the way we split our user input to fix the bug

When the user key in a date & time, the value is stored as a String

This reduces the functionality when we store the date and time

Let's Change the format of the stored date to be LocalDateTime

The output results in print statements

This will result in unwanted output

Let's remove all the print statement

commitResults.messageTitle: Add additional to make the code more OOP
commitResults.messageBody:
Majority of the functionality is in Echo.java

This makes it difficult to modify and maintain the code

Let's create additional classes to utilize the strength of OOP. Class
created will be as follows
* Parser: parse user's input
* Storage: saving and retrieving information in the file
* TaskList: information about the task list
* Ui: interaction with the user

commitResults.messageTitle: Change the Basic functionality of the chatbot into OOP
commitResults.messageBody:
The current code may result in difficulty maintaining.

This is due to the code not fully utilizing OOP standard.

Let's change the basic functionality into OOP standard before adding
the rest.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Saving task list to a text file in a more OOP way
commitResults.messageBody:
Let's amend the Storage.java file to include the functionality of
saving it to a file

commitResults.messageTitle: Add the ability to load data from file
commitResults.messageBody:
Currently, when the user use the chatbot, the information keyed in
before the chatbot was restarted will be lost

This is will cause the user to retype all their todo list

Let's create the ability to load from the file into the chatbot

commitResults.messageTitle: Divide the files into its own package
commitResults.messageBody:
The current classes are in a single file

This makes it difficult to maintain

Let's divide the classes into its own packages

commitResults.messageTitle: Update runtest.bat file to include updated code
Add JUnit for automated testing purposes
commitResults.messageBody:
We are using a script to test out input and output.

This will be difficult to manage in the future.

Let's add JUnit and test cases to help with our automated testing. The
test cases include the basic input for "Event" and "Todo" tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Bug: Adding an event contains an additional output on screen
Bug: Fixed the inconsistency in spacing when displaying and saving deadlines and event

commitResults.messageBody:
There is not class for the testing of deadline's class.

Not testing deadline class might pose issues in the future.

Let's create test cases and deadlineTest class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add additional test cases for Task
commitResults.messageBody:
There is currently not test cases for Task class.

There could be issue in the future relating to the Task class.

Let's create a TaskTest class for the purpose of testing the methods.

Current readme file contains the default name.

This might cause confusion.

Let's update the README file to contain the correct name.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change the date format when printing the deadline
commitResults.messageBody:
The current date printed shows the exact date.

This is less easier to read as compared to writing the month out
explicitly.

Let's change the date time format to print the deadline in MMM dd yyyy
format.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Javadoc to all the classes
commitResults.messageBody:
The current document don't contain any java doc

This might be difficult others to understand the code

Let's add javadoc to all the classes

commitResults.messageTitle: Add the ability to find task
commitResults.messageBody:
The current program does not contain the find functionality.

This limits the ability for the user to check if they have added a task.

Let's add the functionality to find task.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update the code base to follow the coding statndard
Update the code to be in accordance to our java coding standard

commitResults.messageTitle: bug fix: Encounter error when Echo file is not found
Bug Fix: Able to parse dates of different type from saved file
Remove class that is not in used (Duke.java)

commitResults.messageBody:
There could be assumptions that the coder made that results in error.

To prevent this from happening, "assert" will be utilized throughput
the code.

The code contains dead code in multiple lines.

This might lead to confusion in the future.

Let's delete the dead code in our files.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update build gradle to include checkstyle
commitResults.messageBody:
The checkstyle in build.gradle is not active (commented out).

This prevents us from checking if we're following the style.

Let's add in the checkstyle in the build.gradle.
Add asserts functionality

* 'master' of https://github.com/CJ-783/ip:
  Add asserts functionality

# Conflicts:

Merge A-CodeQuality branch
